resources.string: Press Back twice quickly to exit!
Press Button twice quickly to exit!
VP out of Bounds!!!! Increase qty with QtyVp++.
Is Photo captured ok? (You can zoom in!!!)
No local media captured in this vp, click on the WebApp button.
Please check your setup files. Sorry, closing now...
VP capture successful. Touch on the description to edit it.
VP capture failed, please refer to configuration instructions, try again or change method.
VP photo captured, but augmentation acquisiton was not possible, due to lack of detail in the image, please refer to configuration instructions, try again or change method.
This device has no camera. Closing app!
Please enable the requested permissions in the app settings in order to use this app
Back to open the main app.
App time is certified, even if device clock is not.
App time is NOT certified, using device clock.
Calling time server, please assure internet connection.
AR is ON, automatically capturing the configured VPs.
AR is OFF, use the camera button to capture VPs.
This is a special VP for photos without AR, thus not configurable.
Media captured without using Augmented Reality
Close image capture and call setup?
Press camera button to take photo. Stay still until VP is configured!!!
Close setup and call image capture?
Please select a VP to start AR capture setup.
This id marker was used already in another VP, please use a different one.
Calling server, please assure internet connection.
Delete local and remote currently on screen media.
Delete locally media currently on screen.
There are no local setup files and no connection to MyMensor server. If you decide to continue new files will be created and eventual old ones will be ERASED. Do you wish to continue?
This app is not compatible with Android versions prior to KitKat. Closing now.
AR config downloaded from server. Using latest configuration.
No connection with server. Using locally available configuration.
Something wrong happened while downloading configuration from server. Please try again or restore smartphone backup on the web app.
Something wrong happened while reading local configuration. Please try again and contact support if problem persists.
Only one user is allowed per device. To change user you first need to logout.
An error occurred while playing video.
If you proceed a new configuration will be created and will overwrite (if you have one) your existing one.
Share the link to this photo using:
Share the link to this video using:
Maximum quantity of clients connected to server exceeded, closing...
Cannot proceed due to error with server connection, closing...
Trial period has expired, continuing with no server connection.
Subscription expired, continuing with no server connection.
I\'ve read and agreed with the
In order to register to MyMensor you must read and agree to our terms and policies.
AR configuration still loading. Try again later.
AR config not available. Capture media without AR.
AR Configuration loaded but Checked VP info was lost.
Press back twice quickly to return to image capture!
Click on TIPS to have a walkthrough of this screen! Go to our mymensor.com website to find all the help you will need!
Walk trough how to use the functions of MyMensorAR main screen.
That\'s the end of the walktrough!
Click this button whenerver you need a refresher!
Press this button to take a photo.
And this one to make short videos.
Before you capture media without AR, please select the folder (vp) to which you want them to be archived.
Status of the current media certification.
Here you check, reload and turn on and off certifications, namely location, time and server connection.
Click here to check the media you captured.
Turn it ON to capture pre-configured photos or OFF to snap photos and videos using the shutter buttons.
Put the radar over your preconfigured areas to start AR capture. See ou video USING AUGMENTED REALITY.

Check on the WebApp all captures you ever made with MyMensorAR, see a map showing the location of your captures, routes, tags to turn your images into data, all the controls to your account and much, much more!!!
Download PDF certificate of the current media?
Media capture location certification state unknown
Media time capture certification state unknown
The current VP is a super VP
Let\'s take a tour of the features of the medias captured screen?
Here you will find in which VP folder this media is archived, the name you set to this folder, as well as, the time when this media was created.
Use this and the oposite back button to go thorugh your local medias in this device in this VP.
Use this button to delete a media that is stored locally, for example to free your device memory. Note that the server copy remains intact.
Share the media content, using Android sharing capabilities.
Share a link to the media stored in MyMensor Servers. Using this you save your data plan!
Download the PDF certificate for the current media directly from MyMensor Servers to your mobile! Then you can use it in the way you see fit!
Check if media location is certified or not.
Check if media time is cerified or not.
Here you can see if this media was captured using AR. If it is AR OFF then no AR was used to capture this media.
When using AR to capture, the media will be automatically stored in the VP that you have configured.
Trial period has expired, cannot install the app with this user. Create a new user or contact support if you want to extend trial for this user.
Subscription expired, cannot install the app using this user.
MyMensorAR cannot run without the permission to use the camera. Please grant the permission in order to use the app.
MyMensorAR needs to access your fine location in order to perform its duty. You can turn off location tracking from inside the app. Please grant the permission.
MyMensor needs the permission to record audio in order to record video. Please grant the permission.
Information on VP configuration display screen
Let\'s take a tour on the features of the VP configuration display screen?

Here you will find the VP folder description, as well as, the next time it will be availble for capturing. If you see a picture in this screen, instead of the MyMensor Logo, it means that this is the standard capture for this VP.
Use this button to enter the AR configuration for this VP.
Use this button to enable the see-through mode for this VP. Click and check it out! It can be useful with difficult to capture VPs.
Here you can check if this VP has AR configured. If so, you will be able to see details here, if any.
Tap here to show the VP captures that are stored in your smartphone. For all captures go to the WebApp!
Your trial has expired. Connection to server is not possible.
Your subscription has expired. Connection to server is not possible.
Initial Screen of the AR Configuration
Let\'s take a tour of this screen?
Here you select which VP you want to set up Augmented Reality.
After configuration is done, press this button and return to the image capture portion of the app. You can also do this by pressing back twice.
Here you will find if the AR is configured (OK) in this VP or if it is not configured (OFF).
Here you can turn on (BLUE) or off (GRAY) this VP\'s ambiguity. If it is on, you will neeed a MyMensor Marker in the scene. Check our videos!

Use this button to turn on (BLUE) the super VP feature. When using this you will, as well, need to print a MyMensor Super Marker from our WebApp. The Super Marker must be on the scene for the VP to be configured. Check our videos!
The last thing you will do, even after capturing the VP standard photo, is to modify the VP name, from the standard numbers to whatever you want!
Pressing this button you will be taken to the actual capture of the standard VP photo. In the next screen you will center you subject image and will capture the standard photo.

This is the camera shutter button to capture your standard photo to this VP. This button will turn LIGHT BLUE when the app is ready to capture the photo. Try to center the main part of your image inside the target square. If you are using one of our markers they must be inside the image in order for the button to become LIGHT BLUE.
Standard VP Photo Capture Configuration Screen
Let\'s have a walktrough on this screen?
Cannot install without server connection, seek a better internet connection.
